Welcome to the Wingspan: Asia Expansion Open Beta!

Welcome to the Wingspan: Asia Expansion Open Beta!

You're now taking part in the open beta - thank you for joining us! Explore new birds, new strategies, features and help us make this expansion the best it can be.
Here’s everything you’ll be able to explore:

<style=asia>Duet Mode</style>

A brand-new game mode designed for exactly <style=asia>2 players</style> with special <style=asia>Duet Map</style> and <style=asia>end-of-round goals</style> - available in singleplayer and online multiplayer (including real-time matchmaking).

<style=asia>New tutorial</style>

Fresh and revamped Wingspan tutorial divided into <style=asia>short, bite-sized chapters</style> - so no pressure to finish it all at once. You’ll also find brand-new tutorials introducing Asia bird powers and one focused entirely on the Duet Mode, designed to help you get started. <style=asia>Complete the tutorial to unlock special in-game prizes!</style> 

<style=asia>Asia Expansion Additions</style>

90 new bird cards with fresh powers
New bonus cards
A brand-new Asia Expansion menu
4 new backgrounds
6 new player portraits 
A new Asia Expansion soundtrack
Bird trivia for all the new birds
Active games now display the game mode

<style=asia>Multiplayer Updates</style>

Real-time matchmaking now has 3-minute turns
A new match backup system has been added
Since we’re introducing some changes and improvements to Multiplayer, you might encounter some turbulence and “controlled instability” during online games. To test the backup system, we’ve scheduled two server resets:

<style=asia>April 11 at 10AM CET</style>
<style=asia>April 14 at 10AM CET</style>

<style=underline>Make sure to visit our Discord to share your feedback and join the Achievement Contest starting April 11!</style> Also, try out a new Steam feature and Invite your friends to join the Beta - they don’t even have to own Wingspan! 

Have fun!

You're now taking part in the open beta - thank you for joining us! Explore new birds, new strategies, features and help us make this expansion the best it can be.
Here’s everything you’ll be able to explore:

<style=asia>Duet Mode</style>

A brand-new game mode designed for exactly <style=asia>2 players</style> with special <style=asia>Duet Map</style> and <style=asia>end-of-round goals</style> - available in singleplayer and online multiplayer (including real-time matchmaking).

<style=asia>New tutorial</style>

Fresh and revamped Wingspan tutorial divided into <style=asia>short, bite-sized chapters</style> - so no pressure to finish it all at once. You’ll also find brand-new tutorials introducing Asia bird powers and one focused entirely on the Duet Mode, designed to help you get started. <style=asia>Complete the tutorial to unlock special in-game prizes!</style> 

<style=asia>Asia Expansion Additions</style>

90 new bird cards with fresh powers
New bonus cards
A brand-new Asia Expansion menu
4 new backgrounds
6 new player portraits 
A new Asia Expansion soundtrack
Bird trivia for all the new birds
Active games now display the game mode

<style=asia>Multiplayer Updates</style>

Real-time matchmaking now has 3-minute turns
A new match backup system has been added
Since we’re introducing some changes and improvements to Multiplayer, you might encounter some turbulence and “controlled instability” during online games. To test the backup system, we’ve scheduled two server resets:

<style=asia>April 11 at 10AM CET</style>
<style=asia>April 14 at 10AM CET</style>

<style=underline>Make sure to visit our Discord to share your feedback and join the Achievement Contest starting April 11!</style> Also, try out a new Steam feature and Invite your friends to join the Beta - they don’t even have to own Wingspan! 

Have fun!

<style=asia>New tutorial</style>

Fresh and revamped Wingspan tutorial divided into <style=asia>short, bite-sized chapters</style> - so no pressure to finish it all at once. You’ll also find brand-new tutorials introducing Asia bird powers and one focused entirely on the Duet Mode, designed to help you get started. <style=asia>Complete the tutorial to unlock special in-game prizes!</style> 

<style=asia>Asia Expansion Additions</style>

90 new bird cards with fresh powers
New bonus cards
A brand-new Asia Expansion menu
4 new backgrounds
6 new player portraits 
A new Asia Expansion soundtrack
Bird trivia for all the new birds
Active games now display the game mode

<style=asia>Multiplayer Updates</style>

Real-time matchmaking now has 3-minute turns
A new match backup system has been added
Since we’re introducing some changes and improvements to Multiplayer, you might encounter some turbulence and “controlled instability” during online games. To test the backup system, we’ve scheduled two server resets:

<style=asia>April 11 at 10AM CET</style>
<style=asia>April 14 at 10AM CET</style>

<style=underline>Make sure to visit our Discord to share your feedback and join the Achievement Contest starting April 11!</style> 

Have fun!
